_metadata.notes: Token speeds verified through actual testing. Added qwen3-vl:235b-instruct-cloud model. Use --update to refresh from Ollama API.

glm-4.6:cloud.best_for: Advanced coding, full-stack development, legacy code refactoring, DevOps automation

deepseek-v3.1:671b-cloud.best_for: Reasoning, analysis, balanced tasks with hybrid thinking mode

kimi-k2:1t-cloud.best_for: Complex reasoning, code generation, mathematical problem-solving, long document analysis

kimi-k2-thinking:cloud.best_for: Autonomous problem-solving, tool orchestration, advanced coding tasks, long-context planning

qwen3-coder:480b-cloud.best_for: Code generation, debugging, real-time coding help across multiple languages

minimax-m2:cloud.best_for: Software development, agent development with tools, technical content creation

qwen3-vl:235b-cloud.best_for: General vision tasks, OCR, document analysis, basic multimodal reasoning, image understanding
qwen3-vl:235b-cloud.notes: Fastest vision model, 32-lang OCR, 256K context expandable to 1M tokens

qwen3-vl:235b-instruct-cloud.best_for: Instruction-following vision tasks, visual agent operations, code generation from images, precise GUI automation, conversational AI with vision
qwen3-vl:235b-instruct-cloud.notes: Optimized for instruction adherence, visual agent capabilities, 32-lang OCR, 256K context expandable to 1M tokens
